text: Gilbert Burford (February 29, 1924 â€“ July 10, 2022) was an American ice hockey Right Wing. He played for Michigan in the late 1940s and early 1950s. Burford died on July 10, 2022, at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American ice hockey right wingers Category:Sportspeople from Detroit
